message.body: So much fun everyone wished u were there
I wish I was there too! Glad you had fun though. We did it up in Philly for the fourth, it got wild.
Damn son that's wassup. What r we gonna hang again
Maybe. Did u look into to Minnesota
I think I'm gonna be too poor to go :( :( this is the first time I've been a bridesmaid but it is fuckingggg expensive!
Why is it expensive for u

Cause the bridesmaids dress is $200 plus another hundred for alterations. Then we have to pay for the bridal shower and the bachelorette party and hair and makeup and gifts for every event. Shit is wild.
Fuck I might be a groomsmen soon
Well I mean, at least you don't have a bridal party, that's one less expense. But it's crazy. Plus the money I lose for taking off all these weekends to do this stuff is a killer for me
Well damn guess we ain't doing no trips :(
